source.name: Interest Cost on the Debt Outstanding
source.description: The Interest Expense on the Debt Outstanding includes the monthly interest for:  •tU.S. Treasury notes and bonds  •tForeign and domestic series certificates of indebtedness, notes and bonds  •tSavings bonds  •tGovernment Account Series (GAS)  •tState and Local Government series (SLGs) and other special purpose securities.   Amortized discount or premium on bills, notes and bonds is also included in the monthly interest expense.
